## Microsattelite

```{r msatspsp}
vroom::vroom("results/species_specific_snps/results_coherent_type_2.tsv") %>% 
  filter(count > 0) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(individual, snp, fill = log10(count))) +
  geom_tile() +
  theme(axis.text = element_blank(), axis.line = element_blank(),
        legend.position = "bottom") +
  xlab("Individual") + ylab("SNP") +
  facet_grid(~ variant + species, scales = "free_x", space = "free_x") +
  viridis::scale_fill_viridis(option = "C") +
  ggtitle(
    paste("N =", length(unique(vroom::vroom("results/species_specific_snps/results_coherent_type_2.tsv")$snp)))
  )
```
